resources.string: Players are divided into two types: Spies and Civilians.Only civilians know the location and they must find the Spy. The Spy must guess the location
All players ask questions in turn. You can ask questions to any player.
Listen and memorize questions and answers from other players
Any player may name the Spy. After that, all players vote whether the player is the Spy

With the consent of all players, the selected player voices his role. If he turns out to be a Civilian, the Spy wins. If the Spy has guessed the location, he can name it. If the Spy guessed right, he wins, otherwise, he loses
Be mindful of the time. It is limited and plays into the hands of the spy. At the end of the timer, the Spy wins.
